item.name: AUTH REQUESTS
item.description:
### 1\. **Register User**

- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/auth/register`
- **Description:** Register a new user in the system. All fields are required. Passwords are hashed before storage. On successful registration, an access token and a refresh token are returned.
- **Headers:** None required
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123"
}

 ```

- **Response (201 Created):**
    

```
{
  "accessToken": "<JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>",
  "refreshToken": "<JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN>"
}

 ```

---

### 2\. **Login User**

- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login`
- **Description:** Authenticate an existing user using email and password. On success, returns an access token and a refresh token.
- **Headers:** None required
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123"
}

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "accessToken": "<JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>",
  "refreshToken": "<JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN>"
}

 ```

---

### 3\. **Refresh Token**

- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/auth/refresh-token`
- **Description:** Generate a new access token and refresh token using a valid refresh token.
- **Headers:** None required
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "refreshToken": "<JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN>"
}

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "accessToken": "<NEW_JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>",
  "refreshToken": "<NEW_JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN>"
}

 ```

---

### 4\. **Logout**

- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/auth/logout`
- **Description:** Log out a user by invalidating the refresh token.
- **Headers:** None required
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "refreshToken": "<JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN>"
}

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "message": "Logged out"
}

 ```

item.name: BOOK REQUESTS
item.description:
**Important:** All book requests require the **Authorization header**:  
`Key: Authorization`  
`Value: Bearer`

---

### 1\. **Create Book**

- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/books`
- **Description:** Add a new book to the database. Requires authorization.
- **Headers:**
    

```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>
Content-Type: application/json

 ```

- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "title": "The Great Gatsby",
  "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
  "year": 1925,
  "genre": "Fiction"
}

 ```

- **Response (201 Created):**
    

```
{
  "_id": "book_id_here",
  "title": "The Great Gatsby",
  "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
  "year": 1925,
  "genre": "Fiction"
}

 ```

---

### 2\. **Get All Books**

- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/books`
- **Description:** Retrieve a paginated list of all books. Requires authorization.
- **Headers:**
    

```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>

 ```

- **Query Parameters (optional):**
    

```
page=<page_number>
limit=<items_per_page>
author=<author_name> (for filtering)

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "books": [
    {
      "_id": "book_id_here",
      "title": "The Great Gatsby",
      "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
      "year": 1925,
      "genre": "Fiction"
    }
  ],
  "page": 1,
  "limit": 10,
  "total": 50
}

 ```

---

### 3\. **Get Single Book by ID**

- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/books/:id`
- **Description:** Retrieve a single book by its ID. Requires authorization.
- **Headers:**
    

```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "_id": "book_id_here",
  "title": "The Great Gatsby",
  "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
  "year": 1925,
  "genre": "Fiction"
}

 ```

---

### 4\. **Update Book by ID**

- **Method:** PUT
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/books/:id`
- **Description:** Update a bookâ€™s details by its ID. Requires authorization.
- **Headers:**
    

```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>
Content-Type: application/json

 ```

- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
{
  "title": "The Great Gatsby Updated",
  "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
  "year": 1925,
  "genre": "Classic"
}

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "_id": "book_id_here",
  "title": "The Great Gatsby Updated",
  "author": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
  "year": 1925,
  "genre": "Classic"
}

 ```

---

### 5\. **Delete Book by ID**

- **Method:** DELETE
- **URL:** `http://localhost:5000/api/books/:id`
- **Description:** Remove a book from the database by its ID. Requires authorization.
- **Headers:**
    

```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN>

 ```

- **Response (200 OK):**
    

```
{
  "message": "Book deleted successfully"
}

 ```

EndFragment
